name: code-exercise-documentation
description: Documentation using OPEN-API specification for a code exercise of Kinesis.

scripts.clear-watcher: echo fs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288 | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf && sudo sysctl -p
scripts.test-web: npm run build-all && npm run web-server
scripts.gh-pages: rm -rf web_deploy && mkdir -p web_deploy && cp -r dist/* web_deploy && swagger-repo gh-pages -b src
scripts.generate-from-scratch: npm run test && npm run build-all && npm run typescript
scripts.generate-lib: npm run generate-lib-angular && npm run generate-lib-android
scripts.generate-lib-android: npm run generate-java && npm run install-java
scripts.generate-lib-angular: npm run generate-typescript && npm run install-typescript
scripts.install-angular: cd ../libs/typescript && npm i && npm run build && npm pack

author: Patricio Perpetua
